security: Revealing operational details, such as meeting locations (Sands Hotel, Miami Beach), code names (William Cline, BETO), communication methods (KEYWAY sterile phone number, OTPs concealed in a shaving kit), and planned meetings in Mexico City, could jeopardize the agent, compromise communication channels, and expose operational tactics. Explicit instructions to VASLOUCH/2, such as to 'react with disbelief combined with Indignation if a recruitment pitch was made' and to discourage social contact with the LOGUINOVs, clearly demonstrate methods used to maintain the agent's cover and to potentially misinform hostile intelligence services. The document also reveals the agent's concerns about her daughter's associations, particularly with an ODACID officer, which is considered sensitive. Quoting directly: 'instructed V/2 to tighten up on their security citing the dangers of audio-surveillance and the necessity for great care when mailing the letters out' and 'KUBARK security in dealing with her case was emphasized'.
summary: A contact report detailing meetings with VASLOUCH/2 (a Brazilian Embassy employee) in Miami Beach in May 1963, focusing on her contacts with Valentine S. LOGUINOV (a Soviet Embassy attache), and providing operational guidance and communication methods.
summary_one_paragraph: This SECRET contact report, dated June 17, 1963, outlines meetings with VASLOUCH/2 in Miami Beach, Florida, on May 19 and 20, 1963. During these meetings, attended by DI UBALDO and DORENOSE (posing as William Cline), discussions centered on VASLOUCH/2's cultivation by Valentine S. LOGUINOV of the Soviet Embassy, as well as information from Francisco SANCHEZ regarding road building projects in Cuba. VASLOUCH/2 provided insights into LOGUINOV's personal details and contacts and was instructed to handle further interactions cautiously, including tightening security measures and discouraging social contact. The report details arrangements for communication, including the use of a KEYWAY sterile phone number and OTPs, and addresses concerns about VASLOUCH/2's daughter's associations in Moscow. Guidance was provided to VASLOUCH/2 on managing potential recruitment attempts and future contacts.
title: CONTACT REPORT: VASLOUCH/2, DI UBALDO, and DORENOSE
